product_name: Eagle Creek USB Universal Travel Adapter Pro
long_description: Powering all 2- and 3-prong devices, this grounded adapter plus dual USB charger works in more than 150 countries so you can charge your mobile device or use your electric toothbrush overseas.
short_description: Powering all 2- and 3-prong devices, this grounded adapter plus dual USB charger works in more than 150 countries so you can charge your mobile device or use your electric toothbrush overseas.
